data.title: Winds Anarchy | 1.17.x - 1.19
data.description1:
A 1.19 Minecraft Anarchy Server
Focusing on High Ququality Survival Experience
data.1-19-update: 1.19 released, we are preparing the upgrade of 1.19, for details, please see >>
data.description2: No Rules, Original Map, More Challenging, Non 2b2t Map. Limit Flight & Timer Properly, Remove Illegal Items.
data.description3: No Queue, No Whitelist, No Online Mode, No Dupe Fix, No Redstone Limit. Allow all characters as username, and bedrock version support.
data.description4: Powered by high performance Host, multiple BGP for disaster recovery. Professional optimized, Always keep TPS 19-20 with low mspt. ^_^
data.description5: We have years of experience in DevOps. When bug is found, we will provide a solution in 5 minutes and fix it. Owner is cute, Welcome to contact us~ UwU
data.description6: Strong Administration Group, Abundant DevOps Experience.
